### How to Work with Complex Models: IT Model Averaging

```{r standardize-model}
# Global model
library(arm)


a <- c(0.91,0.52)
b <- c(0.61,1.90)

c <- data.frame(a,b)
fit1 <- lm(b ~ a, data=c)

a <- c(0.91,0.52)
bb <- c(0.61,1.90)

d <- data.frame(a,bb)
fit2 <- lm(bb ~ a, data=d)

stdz.model<-arm::standardize(fit1)
stdz.model<-arm::standardize(fit2)


str(c)
str(d)
str(fit1)
str(fit2)

```
